abstract: Three police officers are wounded in shooting on Chicago's West Side.
lead_paragraph: Three Chicago police officers were wounded Monday night in a shooting on the city’s West Side, a spokesman for the Police Department said.

headline.main: Illinois: 3 Chicago Police Officers Are Wounded in a Shooting
headline.print_headline: Illinois: 3 Chicago Police Officers Are Wounded in a Shooting

snippet: Three Chicago police officers were wounded Monday night in a shooting on the city’s West Side, a spokesman for the Police Department said.
